alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Greenwood (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Abbeville and Greenwood Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southeast of Greenwood, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Ninety Six, Troy, Ninety Six Historic Site, Promised Land, Bradley, Kirksey, Callison and Epworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for Upstate South Carolina.
